name: Questions for Discussion
description:
Questions For Discussion aka QFD Game is a fast-paced, easy to learn, crowd-pleasing party game. QFD Game provokes insightful conversation where players exercise the creative part of the brain to respond. Scoring is open to interpretation however typically the best response in 30 seconds or less wins!

*Must be 18 to play R rated category*

Uses: Coworkers. Parties. Date night. Dinner time. Classroom. Ice breakers.
